attributes.action: regulate and abolish charges for   pre payment meters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people who have pre payment meters for energy are being charged extra for the priveledge of having one in thier home, energy prices are high enough without extra charges. the energy companys are getting thier money first instead of sending a bill why should there be an extra charge they have the money upfront, and surely this is more cost effective to them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
